entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 40%
